WorkItem.Description:
In the list of finger enchantments in Rawr 5.0.2.0, all three STA ring enchants need to be changed:


The Greater Stamina enchant with value 160 STA should have value 240 STA (there was a tooltip error at one point, but in general STA enchants have 50% more budget than primary stats)
The Greater Stamina enchant with value 60 STA should be called just Stamina
The Stamina enchant with value 30 STA should be called Lesser Stamina


I think the last two are due to Blizzard having rationalised the names this time round, so "Greater" can be used for all the MoP finger enchants.
WorkItem.Summary: STA ring enchants names and values
